forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending this morning. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain this morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High near 10C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 51F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
